SEARCH
Package geometries

Class Plane

java.lang.Object
geometries.Plane
All Implemented Interfaces:
Geometry, Intersectable
public class Plane extends Object implements Geometry
Represents a plane in a 3D space defined by a point and a normal vector. The Plane class provides methods for creating a plane and getting its normal vector.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    Plane(Point p1, Point p2, Point p3)
    Constructor to initialize the plane using three points.
    Plane(Point point, Vector normal)
    Constructor to initialize the plane with a point and a normal vector.

  • Constructor Details

    • Plane

      public Plane(Point point, Vector normal)
      Constructor to initialize the plane with a point and a normal vector.
      Parameters:
      point - a point on the plane.
      normal - the normal vector to the plane.

    • Plane

      public Plane(Point p1, Point p2, Point p3)
      Constructor to initialize the plane using three points. This constructor calculates the normal vector based on the three points.
      Parameters:
      p1 - the first point.
      p2 - the second point.
      p3 - the third point.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the points are collinear or two of them are identical.
